title: LF top jungler midlaner bronze/silver
body:
Well hello there guys, we're looking for TOP JUNGLER and MIDLANER for ranked team and also a SUB ADC for team in general. 
ADD either me (Daveyion) or roxasinthesky for details. I play league almost everyday from 10 am to 5 pm nzdt while roxas plays from monday to friday same time execpt fridays (around 10 am-3 pm is his time)

Requirements:
- must be a team oriented person
- must have composure and respect to other players
- must know that they're playing rankedteam/duoq/soloq not LCS 
- must have skype (I think this is optional) 
- we don't look at individual stats we look how you will play in a team in general
- (optional) one who likes anime XD

replies.body: Hey I will add you soon when I am online but I feel like replying right now anyways. I main sip actually but can easily play any role. I will take jungle or top probably top. I am keen to join a team as solo queue is irritating when you play well but still lose because of your team. Don't worry I am probably one of the most friendly players you might meet, I'm always encouraging and anti-toxic. I am mainly a team player and I feel I can bring even more team player-ness to the team with my support role attitude. I will tell you more about me later when I add you.
If you still need a mid laner shoot me an invite I would have to learn the hours since I'm from NA
